condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Covenant (i) | Description :(i) No later than 31 January 2013, MIDIS shall hire and thereafter maintain duringthe execution of the Project, a Project Coordinator, with functions, responsibilities, qualifications and experience acceptable tothe Bank, as set forth in the Operational Manual; | Due Date :31-Mar-2013

Finance Agreement :Covenant (ii) | Description :(ii) Operate and maintain, until the completion of the execution of the Project, aProject coordination unit (UCPS), with functionsand responsibilities satisfactory to the Bank, as set forth in the OperationalManual; and | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Covenant (iii) | Description :(iii) MIDIS and UCPS shall carry out the Project in accordance with the IndigenousPeoples Strategy. | Due Date :31-Jan-2017
